article_title: Stanislaus Surgical Hospital always a different patient experience
article_text: Stanislaus Surgical Hospital of Modesto has always tried to create a different experience for its patients and surgeons. The physician-owned hospital, at East Orangeburg Avenue and Oakdale Road, marks its 30th anniversary today, giving its leaders the right to boast about its special approach to health care.
